name: Boatcraft
description:
Welcome to the Boatcraft !

Boatcraft is early-acces indie game, about building boat from your dreams.Only limitation is your crativity.

Boatcraft linux and macOS download, are available on https://boatcraftgame.com


MinimalRecommendedCpuIntel Celeron 4th generation/
AMD Intel Core i3 3rd generation/
AMD Ryzen 3 1200GpuIntel HD 3000Nvidia GT730 or AMD equivalentRam300mb free1GB freeDisk space100mb free0.5GB freeNetwork32kb/s, ping up to 150ms
